V's shield is a shield created during The Fremennik Exiles quest. It is a recreation of the shield owned by the legendary warrior V.

It acts as a mirror shield when fighting basilisks, basilisk knights and cockatrice.

If lost, it can be reobtained from Brundt the Chieftain in Rellekka's longhall for 50,000.

Creation[edit | edit source]

During the quest, the shield is made from four items with a glassblowing pipe and hammer in the inventory:

  • V sigil (e), made by smithing 3 lunar bars into a V sigil and enchanting it with Fossegrimmen
  • A fremennik shield, which can be obtained by killing dagannoths on Waterbirth Island or citizens of Rellekka, or by paying Bardur 150,000 (free if the Ring of charos(a) is worn)
  • Lunar glass, made by bringing molten glass to Baba Yaga on Lunar Isle, and using the resultant molten glass (i) on the Astral Altar along with 100 astral runes
  • A polishing rock, made by dropping a pet rock into the large geyser north-west of the Mountain Camp, then fishing it out with a fishing rod while equipping ice gloves

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
11 May 2022
(update | poll)

V's shield has received the following changes:

  • Ranged Attack bonus increased from -2 to +0.
  • Magic Attack bonus increased from -8 to +0.
  • Magic Defence bonus increased from -1 to +5.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The colour of the shield's backside changes according to the colour of the player's default boots, and thus can be changed by choosing a different colour from Yrsa in Rellekka. The variants are shown below:

  • Brown shoes

  • Khaki shoes

  • Ashen shoes

  • Dark shoes

  • Terracotta shoes

  • Grey shoes

v • d • e

[[File:V's shield detail.png|left|130px]]
'''V's shield''' is a shield created during [[The Fremennik Exiles]] quest. It is a recreation of the shield owned by the legendary warrior [[V]].

It acts as a [[mirror shield]] when fighting [[basilisk]]s, [[basilisk knight]]s and [[cockatrice]]. 

If lost, it can be reobtained from [[Brundt the Chieftain]] in [[Rellekka]]'s longhall for {{Coins|50000}}.

==Creation==
During the quest, the shield is made from four items with a [[glassblowing pipe]] and [[hammer]] in the inventory:
*[[V sigil (e)]], made by smithing 3 [[lunar bar]]s into a [[V sigil]] and enchanting it with [[Fossegrimmen]]
*A [[fremennik shield]], which can be obtained by killing [[Dagannoth (Waterbirth Island)|dagannoths]] on [[Waterbirth Island]] or citizens of [[Rellekka]], or by paying [[Bardur]] {{Coins|150000}} (free if the [[Ring of charos(a)]] is worn)
*[[Lunar glass]], made by bringing molten glass to [[Baba Yaga]] on [[Lunar Isle]], and using the resultant [[molten glass (i)]] on the [[Astral Altar]] along with 100 [[astral rune]]s
*A [[polishing rock]], made by dropping a [[pet rock]] into the large geyser north-west of the [[Mountain Camp]], then fishing it out with a [[fishing rod]] while equipping [[ice gloves]]
